name: Water Park Simulator: Water Slide Tycoon 3D Full
name_original: Water Park Simulator: Water Slide Tycoon 3D Full
description:
Dream of summer, when the weather is so hot and every day is a holiday? There is no need to wait for beach to be opened anymore! Join Water Park Simulator: Water Slide Tycoon 3D and enjoy fantastic waterslides!
Rush into the warm water and take pleasure in sliding and gliding with a dizzy speed! Perform different crazy stunts: twist, make loops, tilt your way round tight corners and enjoy your race! Watch out and be attentive, because there are many different obstacles and your mission is to avoid any collisions and other accidents!
Make sharp turns at intersections, pass every tube and dive with this awesome feeling of absolute happiness and giddy adrenaline! Collect coins and power-ups to level up your game and make a new record! Do your best and enjoy the ride with Water Park Simulator: Water Slide Tycoon 3D!
Earn points and buy interesting upturns! Think ahead, because they’ll help to save your game (like a life ring) and achieve an incredible success! Unlock different kind of water slide - flumes, water chutes, and hyroslides! Enjoy amazing summer views and set amazing records!
Water Park Simulator: Water Slide Tycoon 3D features:
• Great amount of sliders
• Interesting slide locations
• Ease your way down using various power-ups
• Wonderful game modes
Is it true that xtreme is your second name? Then join our wonderful Water Park Simulator: Water Slide Tycoon 3D game and show friends your outstanding skills!
